description.value:
You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge} as a bonus feat.

At 8th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.9p0aAtCyLdcwnftS]{Wind Stance} as a bonus feat.

At 15th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.jbvXxHpu7BVbCpwr]{Lightning Stance} as a bonus feat.

You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.
